summary: About desires and lives of four characters in diverse circumstances. A poor novelist, a cheating wife, a mysophobic husband and a ticket girl.
cast: Jung-shik Bae|Eun-hee Bang|Eun-sook Cho|Kim Jeong-pal|Song Kang-Ho|Eui-sung Kim|Eung-Kyung Lee|Sun-mi Myeong|Jin-seong Park
title: Daijiga umule pajinnal
